title: HELPP!! FPS IS STUCK AT 38
body: I have a gtx 980M and im having problems with fps... I never encounter this problem before... This problem happened 2 days ago.. Until now, i still cant fix it... 90% of the time my fps is always stuck at 38 den that 10% is like 150 fps-300 fps.. i dont know whats the cause of it.. i tried all the methods like disabling anti aliase. reinstalling graphics driver and all. the only solution i found is to put it on windowed mode.. but when i played on windowed mode, i cant move my cameras and have to play on lock screen.. PLS HELP ME!!! I even tried reinstalling league... it didnt work.

replies.body: I have the same problem, but my fps does not come out of 10... And reinstalling will not do any good, let alone format the pc, I did the 2 and it did not work at all.

thanks for the info.. i was closed to formatting my pc... Now tat i know tat it doesnt work... how dafuq do u fix it.... the only way i can play with high fps is windowed... and i cant play like tat cuz i have to lock screen
In other words, you can't play. I can't, because it's probably a problem on the client because I've installed everything to run lol, updated drivers ...

Hmm... given the specific context you've provided, especially the part about windowed mode fixing it, I think this is related to the Windows 10 Game bar. A while ago, Microsoft released the Anniversary update for Win 10, which introduced *Game DVR* in the Game Bar. This causes FPS issues and system crashes for some players, so I'd recommend disabling the game bar using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this caused any change.
so sorry, i tried disabling GAME DVR and it still didnt work.... this is srsly making me quit league.. I cant't find a way to fix this

These types of issues can certainly be frustrating when they aren't easily resolved. We'll need to dive into your system logs in order to troubleshoot this further. I recommend running those logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach the zipped logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists will be happy to help you from here. ^.^
I already disabled the GAME DVR. {{summoner:3}}
